WRITING.TEXT: Check out Lakewood Brewing instead. It's the same price, you get to keep a Belgium style glass, and the lines are A LOT shorter. They have the same music and food trucks, but it's a lot less pretentious and crowded. Plus their beer is a lot better, if you're a beer knurd, also more consistent and true to form. Big Fan!
